Chocolate Hearts

Some days you wake up, and it's -really- not a good day. You've already tried Chocolate Pills, and they're just not helping. Is today a DOUBLE Chocolate day? YES IT IS!!! Just add DOUBLE Chocolate, and your day will RADICALLY improve! Every day can be a DOUBLE Chocolate day if you take Chocolate HEARTS! Chocolate Hearts are a happiness-inducing medication for oral use only. Side effects are common, and include: smiling a MEGA lot more, and having a MUCH better day. Consult yourself to see if today is a DOUBLE Chocolate day before use.

This design is a rebound of a previous design, “Chocolate Pills”.
